snippet: David Nublett prided himself on being self-sufficient. But after being hit by a car, he not only lost his ability to work, but also his independence and his savings....
abstract: Catholic Charities of the Archdiocese of New York, one of eight organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps buy furniture for David Nublett, who has been disabled since 2012 car accident.
lead_paragraph: David Nublett prided himself on being self-sufficient. But after being hit by a car, he not only lost his ability to work, but also his independence and his savings.

headline.print_headline: Car Accident Takes Away Independence and Financial Security
headline.main: A Car Accident Throws a Productive Life Into Turmoil

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
